DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: - To observe the efficacy of the forced titration to reach good glycemic control in Lantus treated patients Secondary objectives: - To assess the forced titration on physician and patient satisfaction - To evaluate the impact of training tools by means of patient profile
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Insulin Glargine in Type 2 Patients for Good Glycemic Control
